```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
gapminder_clean <- read_csv("gapminder_clean.csv")
gapminder_clean.filtered <- gapminder_clean %>% 
  filter(Year == 1962)
```

```{r}
colnames(gapminder_clean.filtered)
```


```{r}
results <- list()
```

```{r}
gapminder_clean.filtered %>% ggplot(aes(x = `CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)`, y = gdpPercap)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_x_log10() + 
  scale_y_log10() + 
  geom_smooth(method = lm)
```

```{r}
results$cor <- cor(gapminder_clean.filtered$`CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)`, gapminder_clean.filtered$gdpPercap, 
    use = "complete.obs")
```

The result is `r results$cor`


```{r}
results$model <- gapminder_clean.filtered %>% lm(gdpPercap ~ `CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)`, data = .)
summary(results$model)
```
